message.content:
1. Secondary endpoints were evaluated in the study.
2. Subjective alertness was one of the secondary endpoints.
3. Subjective alertness was measured using the Stanford Sleepiness Scale.
4. Subjective alertness was evaluated postoperatively.
5. Attention was another secondary endpoint.
6. Attention was measured using the Stroop test.
7. Attention was evaluated preoperatively.
8. Attention was also evaluated 24 hours after surgery.

messages.content:
Statement: Secondary endpoints were subjective alertness (Stanford Sleepiness Scale) postoperatively and attention (Stroop test), which were evaluated preoperatively and 24 hours after surgery.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
